issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add window join to execution engine
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15771](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15771). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We would want to support window joins with as-of support.
See https://github.com/substrait-io/substrait/issues/3 for more.
